description:
Thanks to Sakamoto Ryoma`s peacemaking, the groups trying to end the Tokugawa shogunate and restore imperial rule are now on the same page. With the Shinsengumi prowling the streets of Tokyo looking for rebels, who will come out on top?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Even Saigo Can Run Out of Patience?! Everybody`s Army Advances
Saigou no Kao mo Sando made!? Morimori Shingun Hen
西郷の顔も三度まで!? ~モリモリ進軍編~
